content: 3-inch pompoms attached to the ends of your eye cord add a touch of whimsy to your bag blocking is optional go ahead and start using your new project bag additional notes this bag is quite large and can hold up to an entire small sweater to make a smaller bag work your base to less stitches around and work your turning round and inside of the base to match work less rounds for a shorter bag likewise you can create a larger bag by working your base to a larger size and knitting the body longer
